description: Ms. codex. Title for text 1 from leaf 1b, by a later hand; title for text 2 supplied by cataloger per the Marʻashī catalog. Physical description: 20 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Marginal damp staining and a few repairs. Leaf 1 is a replacement. Origin: 28 Shaʻbān 1099 H [28 June 1688].
author: Ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 918 or 919-991 or 992
contents: 1. leaves 1b-203b: al-Mujallad al-thānī min Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh. Second volume of a collection of ḥadīths addressing legal matters.
2. leaves 204b-228a: [Mashyakhat Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh]. Author's explanation of his authorities and chains of transmission.
extent: 228 leaves : paper ; 247 x 184 (175 x 109) mm bound to 247 x 188 mm

title.@value: المجلد الثاني من من لا يحضره الفقيه
al-Mujallad al-thānī min Man lā yaḥḍuruhu al-faqīh
